title: Harry Connick Jr. receives a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame surrounded by his wife and daughters
text:
He's a beloved American crooner, a respected actor, but also a family man.

On Thursday, Harry Connick Jr's wife and three daughters were at his side, as the actor received a star on the Hollywood Walk Of Fame in recognition of his decades-long entertainment career in music, movies and on television.

Connick Jr., 52, has been married to former Victoria's Secret model Jill Goodacre since 1994, and the couple share three daughters together — Georgia Tatum, 23, Sarah Kate, 22, and Charlotte, 17.

Family guy: Harry's whole family was by his side for his special moment on Thursday

Surrounded by his girls: Connick Jr., has been married to former Victoria's Secret model Jill Goodacre since 1994, and have since thrived in New Orleans, Connecticut and LA, raising their three girls

Another notable guest for the star unveiling was Connick Jr's New In Town costar Renee Zellweger, who said a few words about Harry at the ceremony.

Harry, who is both an Emmy and Grammy winner, wore a blue suit and black tie for the occasion, looking dapper as ever.

His wife Jill, who is a cancer survivor, looked beautiful in a deep green mini dress and nude wedges, as she kissed her husband of 25 years while they posed for photos.

Harry's girls also wore monochromatic mini dresses in shades of black, blue and red.

Proud papa: Harry is father to three gorgeous and statuesque daughters, who each posed with him over his new Hollywood star

Look who it is: Another notable guest for the star unveiling was Connick Jr.'s New In Town costar Renee Zellweger

Harry and Jill started dating when she was at the height of her career as a lingerie model and Cosmopolitan cover girl, and he had sung the music for the movie When Harry Met Sally, with Meg Ryan and Billy Crystal.

Ever since, the two have thrived as they have spent time in New Orleans, Connecticut and Los Angeles, raising their three girls.

Connick Jr. is a notable jazz musician who enjoys the distinction of having won back-to-back Grammys in 1990 and 1991 for Best Jazz Vocal Performance, the former for his When Harry Met Sally song.

True love indeed: Harry's wife Jill looked beautiful in a deep green mini dress and nude wedges

A few years later, the New Orleans, Louisiana-born entertainer shocked audiences with an incredibly terrifying performance as a serial killer in the Holly Hunter/Sigourney Weaver thriller Copycat — which was remarkably only Harry's fourth screen credit.

Since then, the singer and actor has continued to release new music and appear in a fare share of films, including Independence Day and Hope Floats (the latter opposite Sandra Bullock).

Harry has also appeared in a recurring role on Will & Grace and performed judging duties on American Idol as recently as 2016.

What a smile: Connick Jr. is a notable jazz musician who enjoys the distinction of having won back-to-back Grammys in 1990 and 1991 for Best Jazz Vocal Performance, Male

Only good things to say: Zellweger said a few words about Harry at the ceremony
